content.text:
This claim is a counterfactual — it describes a hypothetical scenario: "If voting had been disabled on 2010-07-19, the user with Id 58 would have chosen to leave a comment instead."

This is a "what if" claim about what a user *would have done* under different circumstances. A database only records what actually happened, not what users would have chosen to do in hypothetical scenarios. No SQL query can verify or refute a claim about human behavior under conditions that never existed.
